@siphojanuary. What I mean is if these ppl get it wrong in one sitn they shdnt be necessarily mking another mistake in another...!
@siphojanuary. It s pretty obvious...the decisions made or not made are linked with all kinds of interests...of those who make the decsns
@siphojanuary. Thats the world we live in ...! There is no ideal world...we make the most n the best of what there is or have ..!
@siphojanuary. As I say all this,I kno u r aware that the interntnl community left my country to burn to ashes or actually burned it...
@siphojanuary. Some of them ...!
@siphojanuary. So I say all this with a heavy heart!!!
Speech by Ilham Aliyev at the nationwide festivities on the occasion of Novruz Holiday http://www.president.az/articles/1798?locale=az
For centuries, the people of Azerbaijan celebrated Novruz holiday and lived in this heart. #Azerbaijan
The Azerbaijani people are loyal to national values ​​and national traditions. #Azerbaijan
Today, Azerbaijan is in the real sense of the word, and our country is rapidly moving forward. #Azerbaijan
Azerbaijan has become a regional stability and development factor. #Azerbaijan
Our initiatives strengthen our country, and have a positive impact on the processes going on in the region. #Azerbaijan
Life does not stand, new tasks are facing the country, we face new challenges and we must be ready. #Azerbaijan
Everywhere, officials and officials should serve their dignity and live with their concerns. #Azerbaijan
One of the most important tasks facing the country is the settlement of the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict. #Azerbaijan
@rhondamoor Thanks for your support. Pricing carbon & tackling climate change is the right thing to do for our nation. I'll get it done. JG
The Nagorno-Karabakh conflict can only be solved within the territorial integrity of Azerbaijan. #Azerbaijan
@Mementomori68 That's a very good question and it deserves an answer. JG
The Armenian side should strictly adhere to the resolutions of international organizations, including the UN Security Council. #Azerbaijan
"The current situation requires that everyone rise above personal interests for the formation of a government that 'll meet people's needs"
People living in Nagorno-Karabakh and those who will definitely return there should live in autonomy. #Azerbaijan
For us, independence is the greatest wealth, the greatest blessing, the greatest value. #Azerbaijan
As an independent country, we are pursuing an independent policy and this policy fully meets the interests of the Azerbaijani people. #Azerbaijan
Every foreign citizen coming to Azerbaijan today is seeing, appreciating and appreciating these realities if every guest is impartial. #Azerbaijan
On this dear day, I wish every Azerbaijani citizen good health, happiness and new successes! Happy Holidays! #Azerbaijan
